questions.question: What geometric figure has no corners?
Natasha has 2 kg of candy in her briefcase, and Karina has 2 kg of cotton wool in her briefcase. Which of the girls is more difficult to carry a briefcase?
answers: girls do not exist in reality

questions.question: How many eyes have seen the turnip from the fairy tale of the same name?
What two numbers when multiplied by each other and when added to each other give the same result?
In what case does the number "1" mean "5"?
answers: when the minute hand of the clock shows "five minutes" (stands on the number "1")
in a kindergarten during preschool classes
questions.correctAnswer: when the minute hand of the clock shows "five minutes" (stands on the number "1")

questions.question: On the holiday, the children were served a chocolate roll. There are 10 children at the table, how many cuts do you need to make so that everyone has enough for a piece?
15 students in the class wrote the test for 45 minutes. How much time did each student spend on the test?
6 horses in a team galloped the way after 4 hours. How far did each horse galloped?
There were 5 pears and 5 apples in the vase. The girl took 2 oranges, how many fruits are left in the vase?
There are fruits in the vase. There are much more oranges than bananas and slightly less than plums. What fruits are the most in the vase?
Children came to the holiday. The cake was cut into 4 equal parts, and then each part was cut in half. Everyone got a piece. How many children were there at the holiday?
How many robbers did Ali Baba meet?
